welcome_message_body: Welcome to Penalolen, Chile! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's charming streets, vibrant culture, and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Penalolen has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to international flights, used by some airlines such as LATAM and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic and regional flights, mainly by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.
